00008 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>

00010 // Keys in blockInfo dictionaries passed to delegate methods.
00011 #define BLOCK_NAME_KEY     @"name"    // NSString containing block name (first word of marker)
00012 #define BLOCK_END_NAMES_KEY    @"endNames"   // NSArray containing names of possible ending-markers for block
00013 #define BLOCK_ARGUMENTS_KEY    @"args"    // NSArray of further arguments in block start marker
00014 #define BLOCK_START_MARKER_RANGE_KEY @"startMarkerRange" // NSRange (as NSValue) of block's starting marker
00015 #define BLOCK_VARIABLES_KEY    @"vars"    // NSDictionary of variables
00016 
00017 #define TEMPLATE_ENGINE_ERROR_DOMAIN @"MGTemplateEngineErrorDomain"
00018 
00019 @class MGTemplateEngine;
00020 @protocol MGTemplateMarker;
00021 @protocol MGTemplateFilter;
00022 
00023 @protocol MGTemplateEngineDelegate
00024 @optional
00025 - (void)templateEngine:(MGTemplateEngine *)engine blockStarted:(NSDictionary *)blockInfo;
00026 - (void)templateEngine:(MGTemplateEngine *)engine blockEnded:(NSDictionary *)blockInfo;
00027 - (void)templateEngineFinishedProcessingTemplate:(MGTemplateEngine *)engine;
00028 - (void)templateEngine:(MGTemplateEngine *)engine encounteredError:(NSError *)error isContinuing:(BOOL)continuing;
00029 @end
00030 
00031 // Keys in marker dictionaries returned from Matcher methods.
00032 #define MARKER_NAME_KEY     @"name"    // NSString containing marker name (first word of marker)
00033 #define MARKER_TYPE_KEY     @"type"    // NSString, either MARKER_TYPE_EXPRESSION or MARKER_TYPE_MARKER
00034 #define MARKER_TYPE_MARKER    @"marker"
00035 #define MARKER_TYPE_EXPRESSION   @"expression"
00036 #define MARKER_ARGUMENTS_KEY   @"args"    // NSArray of further arguments in marker, if any
00037 #define MARKER_FILTER_KEY    @"filter"   // NSString containing name of filter attached to marker, if any
00038 #define MARKER_FILTER_ARGUMENTS_KEY  @"filterArgs"  // NSArray of filter arguments, if any
00039 #define MARKER_RANGE_KEY    @"range"   // NSRange (as NSValue) of marker's range
00040 
00041 @protocol MGTemplateEngineMatcher
00042 @required
00043 - (id)initWithTemplateEngine:(MGTemplateEngine *)engine;
00044 - (void)engineSettingsChanged; // always called at least once before beginning to process a template.
00045 - (NSDictionary *)firstMarkerWithinRange:(NSRange)range;
00046 @end
00047 
00048 #import "MGTemplateMarker.h"
00049 #import "MGTemplateFilter.h"
00050 
00051 @interface MGTemplateEngine : NSObject {
00052 @public
00053  NSString *markerStartDelimiter;  // default: {%
00054  NSString *markerEndDelimiter;  // default: %}
00055  NSString *expressionStartDelimiter; // default: {{
00056  NSString *expressionEndDelimiter; // default: }}
00057  NSString *filterDelimiter;   // default: | example: {{ myVar|uppercase }}
00058  NSString *literalStartMarker;  // default: literal
00059  NSString *literalEndMarker;   // default: /literal
00060 @private
00061  NSMutableArray *_openBlocksStack;
00062  NSMutableDictionary *_globals;
00063  int _outputDisabledCount;
00064  int _templateLength;
00065  NSMutableDictionary *_filters;
00066  NSMutableDictionary *_markers;
00067  NSMutableDictionary *_templateVariables;
00068  BOOL _literal;
00069 @public
00070  NSRange remainingRange;
00071  id <MGTemplateEngineDelegate> delegate;
00072  id <MGTemplateEngineMatcher> matcher;
00073  NSString *templateContents;
00074 }
00075 
00076 @property(retain) NSString *markerStartDelimiter;
00077 @property(retain) NSString *markerEndDelimiter;
00078 @property(retain) NSString *expressionStartDelimiter;
00079 @property(retain) NSString *expressionEndDelimiter;
00080 @property(retain) NSString *filterDelimiter;
00081 @property(retain) NSString *literalStartMarker;
00082 @property(retain) NSString *literalEndMarker;
00083 @property(assign, readonly) NSRange remainingRange;
00084 @property(assign) id <MGTemplateEngineDelegate> delegate; // weak ref
00085 @property(retain) id <MGTemplateEngineMatcher> matcher;
00086 @property(retain, readonly) NSString *templateContents;
